structure.unit: Corporations For Charitable And Certain Other Purposes

law.catch_line: Medical Milk Commission; Naming And Designation Of Town Where Established
law.text: The name of any such corporation shall be “Medical Milk Commission of ”, designating the name of the town where such corporation is established, and, if more than one such corporation shall be organized in any town, the subsequent corporations shall use the name designated herein, but shall indicate in such name its proper sequence in incorporation by adding thereto the words “Number Two” or “Number Three” and so forth.
